DOC.brief_summary: Aim : The aim study compare efficacy pretreatment 0.5 mg/kg lidocaine 0.5 mg/kg alkalinize lidocaine prevention propofol induce pain . Methods : In double-blind , placebo control study , 300 adult patient ASA I II , schedule undergo elective surgery , randomly assign three group 100 . Group L , recevied 0.05 mL/kg lidocaine ( % 2 lidocaine 5 mL + 5 mL SF ) , Group A , 0.05 mL/kg lidocaine bicarbonate ( % 2 lidocaine 5 mL + 1 mL % 8,4 NaHCO3+ 4 mL SF ) control group receive isotonic saline pretreatment dorsum hand , follow propofol 30 sec later . A blinded researcher assess patient 's pain level via four-point scale .
DOC.brief_title: Pain Injection Propofol : Comparison Lidocaine Alkalinized Lidocaine
DOC.criteria: undergo elective surgery allergy study drug
